bibl.title: Early Christian Burials in the Fayoum.

Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause
bibl.author: GRIGGS, C. Wilfred

bibl.note: Brief survey of the burial methods and practices encountered at the Fag al-Gamous cemetery, 5 kilometers south of the site of Philadelphia.
GRIGGS C. Wilfred, Early Christian Burials in the Fayoum.

Gawdat GABRA (Ed.), Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause (Cairo - New York, 2005) pp. 185-195, 5 figg., 1 plan.
